Detailed Description

ObitRPC class function definitions.

This class is derived from the Obit base class.

Function Documentation

ObitRPC* newObitRPC (  gchar *  name  ) 
 

Public: Default Constructor.

Initializes class if needed on first call.

Parameters:
name An optional name for the object.
Returns:
the new object.

void ObitRPCAddMethod (  ObitRPC *  server,
gchar *  method_name,
xmlrpc_method  method,
gpointer  user_data,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Add method callback to server.

Parameters:
server Server ObitRPC
method_name name of the method
method function pointer to xmlrpc_method callback
user_data Additional data to be passed to method, may be NULL
err Obit Error message

ObitXML* ObitRPCCall (  ObitRPC *  client,
gchar *  serverURL,
ObitXML *  arg,
ObitInfoList **  status,
ObitInfoList **  request,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Send synchronous RPC request.

Parameters:
client Client ObitRPC
serverURL URL of service, e.g. "http://localhost:8765/RPC2"
arg Argument of call (includes method name )
status [out] if non NULL, Status in form of Info list, entries "code", "reason" Should be Unrefed when done
request [out] if non NULL, Any in form of Info list, entries "code", and case dependent parameters. Returns NULL if no request Should be Unrefed when done
err Obit Error message
Returns:
XML object returned, NULL on communications failure, even if this is defined the function may have failed.

ObitXML* ObitRPCCallRcv (  ObitRPC *  client,
ObitXMLValue *  result,
ObitInfoList **  status,
ObitInfoList **  request,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Process asynchronous RPC response.

Parameters:
client Client ObitRPC
result Response from callback as gpointer
status [out] if non NULL, Status in form of Info list, entries "code", "reason" Should be Unrefed when done
request [out] if non NULL, Any in form of Info list, entries "code", and case dependent parameters. Returns NULL if no request Should be Unrefed when done
err Obit Error message
Returns:
XML object returned, NULL on communications failure, even if this is defined the function may have failed.

void ObitRPCCallSnd (  ObitRPC *  client,
gchar *  serverURL,
ObitXML *  arg,
ObitRPC_response_handler  callback,
gpointer  user_data,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Send asynchronous RPC request.

Request is aynchronously sent; the reply will be to callback

Parameters:
client Client ObitRPC
serverURL URL of service, e.g. "http://localhost:8765/RPC2"
arg Argument of call (includes method name )
callback Callback function typedef void (*xmlrpc_response_handler) (const char *server_url, const char *method_name, xmlrpc_value *param_array, void *user_data, xmlrpc_env *fault, xmlrpc_value *result);
user_data Pointer to be passed to Callback with result
err Obit Error message
Returns:
XML object returned, NULL on communications failure, even if this is defined the function may have failed.

Public: Class shutdown.

void ObitRPCClear (  gpointer  inn  ) 
 

Private: Deallocate members.

Does (recursive) deallocation of parent class members.

Parameters:
inn Pointer to the object to deallocate. Actually it should be an ObitRPC* cast to an Obit*.

void ObitRPCClientAsyncLoop (  olong  timeout  ) 
 

Run client async event loop.

Parameters:
timeout timeout in microseconds, <= -> forever

void ObitRPCInit (  gpointer  inn  ) 
 

Private: Initialize newly instantiated object.

Parent classes portions are (recursively) initialized first

olong  port,
gchar *  log_file
) 
 

Start Server loop.

Parameters:

port Port number to listen to
